Reviews.Title: satisfactory so far
Reviews.Author: Moowk
Reviews.Content: Got two of these for my parents.Pros:  fairly simple to use.  easy to pick up from table.  much lighter than I expected.  screen easy to read.  contacts imported from sim card successfully.Cons:  manual could be written more clearly, especially since this is for older people.  one phone had a dead battery.  the other phone was shipped in the wrong color.  not exactly cheap.Yet to test:  reception quality, other GSM band functionality (overseas), battery life

ProductInfo.Features:
Extremely Easy to Use
Big Buttons / Speaking Keypad
Amplified Sound
Personal Emergensy Response System (PERS)
Unlocked GSM World Phone 850/1900/950/1800 mHz
ProductInfo.Name: JUST5 J510 Senior and Kids Easy to Use Unlocked Cell Phone with Big Buttons (Deep)
